name: ziggurat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large rectangular structure with several levels of different sizes and steps leading up it, built in ancient times, especially in what is now Iraq, and usually forming part of a temple (= a religious building): Susa is the site of the world's best preserved ziggurat. Excavations of the site have revealed a great ziggurat.
coddy/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesWe visited the famous ziggurat at Ur.An art historian might relate the blocky geometric structure to the ziggurats of ancient Mesopotamia.The tower would have risen above the original building's roof like a grotesque ziggurat.
